text: `eng_pikchr` function allows use Pikchr code inside R Markdown documents, rendering image. supports options like `width`, `height`, font `size`, font `family`, CSS classes customize output. function automatically detects output format (HTML LaTeX) generates appropriate image. output LaTeX, SVG converted PNG using `rsvg_png()` function.

title: Pikchr Code Engine for Knitr — eng_pikchr
text: - `eval`: Whether evaluate Pikchr code (default `TRUE`). - `echo`: Whether display code output document (default `TRUE`). - `width`: Width rendered image (default `"80 - `height`: Height rendered image (default `"auto"`). - `size`: Font size Pikchr diagram (default `"100 - `family`: Font family Pikchr diagram (default `"inherit"`). - `align`: Figure align: left, right, center. - `css`: Additional CSS customizing Pikchr diagram. - `class`: CSS class apply diagram (default `"pikchr"`). - `margin`: CSS margin around image (default `"10px 0 10px 0"`). - `lang`: Language Pikchr diagram (optional).

title: Convert Pikchr Code to SVG — pikchr
text: function converts diagram description written Pikchr language SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) format. Pikchr diagram language inspired PIC, function allows easily embed Pikchr diagrams SVG images HTML Markdown documents.

title: Convert Pikchr Code to SVG — pikchr
code: pikchr(   code,   width = NULL,   height = NULL,   fontSize = "100%",   fontFamily = "Jost",   class = "pikchr",   align = "none",   css = NULL,   margin = NULL,   svgOnly = FALSE )

title: Convert Pikchr Code to SVG — pikchr
text: code character string containing diagram code written Pikchr language. width character string representing width rendered SVG. accepts standard HTML values percentages ("75%"), pixels ("300px"), "auto". Defaults "75%". height character string representing height rendered SVG. accepts standard HTML values pixels ("300px") "auto". Defaults "auto". fontSize character string specifying font size text within SVG. accepts standard HTML values percentages ("80%"), pixels, keywords ("large"). Defaults "80%". fontFamily character string specifying font family text diagram. Common values include "inherit" (use page's default font), "Arial", "Times New Roman", etc. Defaults "inherit". class character string specifying CSS class apply SVG. can used style SVG external CSS rules. Defaults "pikchr". align character string specifying alignment SVG within container. Options "center" (default), "left", "right". set "none", alignment applied. css character string containing extra CSS styles apply directly SVG element. allows additional customization beyond width, height, font settings. NULL, extra styles applied. margin character string specifying margin around SVG element, formatted like CSS margin rule (e.g., "10px 0 10px 0"). Defaults "10px 0 10px 0". svgOnly Logical, whether return raw SVG code (TRUE) open diagram Viewer window (FALSE, default).

title: Convert Pikchr Code to SVG — pikchr
text: character string containing SVG diagram code svgOnly = TRUE. Otherwise, function opens diagram Viewer window.
